title: Top Gun
description: Top Gun is a 1987 best-selling game released by Konami. The game is inspired by the movie of the same name. The player’s task is to control his aircraft to destroy enemy aircraft carriers and spacecraft. They will undergo four missions in turn on the flight schedule.

title: War
description: In War, you play as a soldier attacking many enemies on one stage. You use left and right to move, down to pick up power-ups, A to throw a knife (only goes a certain distance to hit the basic enemies) and B to throw a bomb which hits the higher/hiding enemies. You only have a limited number of bombs to use however. All the enemies shoot at you and you must dodge the bullets. The power-ups are invincibility, an extra life and extra bombs. You start on one of four different stages, New Junk City from Earthworm Jim 3, Reptile Rumble from Donkey Kong Country 4, and two stages (parking lot and bar) from Final Fight 3.

title: Yoshi
description: Yoshi is a puzzle game released by Nintendo in 1991. The game is divided into several different levels. At each level, there will be a large number of monsters falling from the ceiling. The task of the player is to destroy all monsters by placing two identical monsters in a column.

title: Zelda II: The Adventure of Link
description: Based on the plot of The Legend of Zelda, the second version of this game was released as Zelda II: The Adventure of Link. In this next version, you will be on a new adventure with Link. In addition, the battle system and character upgrades have been changed to bring exciting experiences for players.

title: 007 – Golden Eye
description: GoldenEye 007 is a classic FPS game from Rare for the console device Nintendo 64. It was created based on the GoldenEye movie whose protagonist is James Bond, also known as agent 007. Therefore, the plot that the game is directing is quite similar to the story in the movie. There are even scenes rebuilt to bring the most authentic feeling to those who love this guy.

title: 007 – The World Is Not Enough
description: 007 the World Is Not Enough is a first-person shooter game based on inspiration from the film of the same name. The game was developed by Eurocom and brought to market by Electronic Arts. This game received a lot of positive reviews from experts and gamers alike. This version is usually placed on the scale with the version of GoldenEye 007, also exploits the character James Bond, but is of Rare. Join the game, players will incarnate the role of this James Bond secret guy. This time around the event he performed the task of protecting Elektra King and chasing terrorist Renard. More than 14 missions will be assigned to players through the game one after another, with three different difficulty levels. External James Bond can use a variety of weapons, including guns, a watch to be able to use at any time stunned enemy, armor; In addition, there are other interesting items such as X-ray vision goggles or night vision goggles. Players can also participate in battles with their friends in this game, with three mini-games, deathmatch, Capture the flag, or King of the hill.

title: Banjo-Kazooie (Banjo To Kazooie No Daibouken)
description: Banjo-Kazooie is the first game that paves the way for a series of famous and popular games also with the name Banjo-Kazooie, launched in the final years of the old millennium (1998). The game was developed by Rare and was released only for the Nintendo 64 series, until 2008, it was released on the Xbox 360. The game belongs to the platform genre, with three-dimensional graphics that was thoroughly polished to every detail. This is one of the strengths of the game. Evidence for this, in addition to the Console Action Game of the Year award, the game also received an award for Outstanding Achievement in Art/Graphics. Single-player is the only mode played throughout the timeline.

title: Batman Beyond – Return Of The Joker
Beetle Adventure Racing!
description: Beetle Adventure Racing! is one of the rare racing games, when featuring the arcade-style racing of Nintendo 64 series. The game was released by Electronic Arts, through the developer Paradigm Entertainment. The special of this game, as well as a highlight compared to other racing games, is probably the appearance of the Volkswagen New Beetle. In addition to the single-player mode, the game also supports a multiplayer mode with up to four, allowing friends to have the opportunity to participate in car races without being too risky or illegal as in real life. The single-player method offers two modes, Single Race and Championship. The championship is the game’s main playstyle, with three main milestones being Novice, Advanced, and Professional. Part of this mode is the Bonus Circuit, which is considered a secret, only unlocked when the player has completed the races in the previous three. As for Single Race, it is quite simple. This mode allows the player to replay unlocked race levels in the Championship, and of course, is played alone. Beetle Battle is an integrated feature for the multiplayer method with races to find the champion.

title: Bomberman 64 (Baku Bomberman)
description: Bomberman 64 is a game of the action-adventure genre from developer Hudson Soft. The game was published in Japan by Hudson Soft itself, while in PAL region, it was released by Nintendo. The game is one part of the Bomberman series. At the same time, this version also marked an important step when it was the first game to own 3D graphics in the series, which was the basis of the later games.

title: Bomberman Hero
description: Bomberman games seem to be too well known in the gaming market. In it, Bomberman Hero is a game designed for the Nintendo 64 platform, just behind the old Bomberman 64 AI Inc is the developer who made this version. The game is published by Hudson Soft, belonging to the platform line.

title: Castlevania – Legacy Of Darkness
description: Konami’s Castlevania name seems to have dominated the game and movie market over the years. The fact that games are adapted from films seems to be familiar. Going against that, this series of games has created something unbelievable. The stories from this game are so good that a lot of movies have been created based on Castlevania, even cartoons. This series of action-adventure series ranges from 1986 to the present, for a total of more than three decades. The version of Legacy of Darkness entered the market in 1999. The context of this version was set in the 1844s. One day, the werewolf Cornell returned home and realized everything was completely burned down. While sinking into despair and deadlock, he found Ada’s sister’s pendant. The younger sibling’s scent led him to Dracula’s castle. Throughout the game, on the journey to rescue his sister, Cornell must go through traps or fight enemies, even hounds, and vampires. Ortegal, also his friend, is also the last enemy that he must fight.

title: Clay Fighter 63 1-3
description: ClayFighter 63⅓ is a product of Interplay Productions completely. “ClayFighter 63⅓” – sounds familiar, doesn’t it? In fact, its name is based on Naked Gun 33⅓: The Final Insult, as a parody. This is a fighting game, listed as the third version of the ClayFighter series. This story takes place when Dr Kiln wants to create a hooligan, from Bawk Choy material from Bessie, to help him in dominating the world. While Houngan passed by his doctor’s laboratory and discovered his formula, a vial of mutagen had exploded into Dr.’s hand. They began to multiply on his hand to the point that he had to cut off his hand. The hand then fled into the forest, and at the same time, the boat carrying Bad Mister Frosty, Kung Pow, and many others had just arrived. The game has a familiar fighting style that relatively similar to the Street Fighter series, as you can see. However, a special feature here is the game has many houses with different rooms. While fighting in one of the rooms, the player can kick the opponent through another room and then continue fighting right in that room.

title: Conker’s Bad Fur Day
description: Another product from the renowned Rare publisher. Conker’s Bad Fur Day is a game released for Nintendo 64, under the category of platform games. The game is a part of the Conker series, supporting both single-player and multiplayer modes. The world you are about to experience is set in a three-dimensional space.

title: Cruis’n USA
description: Cruis’n USA is a famous racing game published by Nintendo for two Arcade versions, Nintendo 64 made by Midway Games and Williams, respectively. Both single-player and multiplayer modes are supported in this version. If you are a speed enthusiast, do not miss this game.

title: Diddy Kong Racing
description: Diddy Kong Racing is a game developed and published by Rare for Nintendo 64 devices. The main concept of the game, as mentioned in the name, revolves around the fascinating car races on Timber Island. Diddy Kong seemed to be a familiar character when he is Donkey Kong’s sidekick, having appeared together many times in the Donkey Kong series. The game belongs to the Kart Racing genre, which is usually being mentioned for games such as the Mario Kart series.

title: Donkey Kong 64
description: “Donkey Kong 64” is a game of the Donkey Kong series, specially designed for Nintendo 64. The game was developed by a leading UK developer, Rare, and released by Nintendo. Adventure genre, a platformer, support for both single-player and multiplayer modes are words that summarize the key features of Donkey Kong 64.

title: Doom 64
description: If you are looking for a first-person shooter game, or want to go through battles specifically designed for only one player, then Doom 64 will be such a good idea. The game was developed and published by Midway Games for the Nintendo 64 platform. This section is the successor to Doom II: Hell on Earth. The game has brought resounding success to the company. Therefore, Midway Games is planning to release a remake in 2020, for Microsoft Windows, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, and of course, Xbox One.

title: Duke Nukem 64
description: Duke Nukem 64 is a famous name for the first-person shooter genre. If you’ve ever known a name like GoldenEye 007 with agent James Bond, then this is a version evaluated as not less than it. Duke Nukem 64 is a port version based on Duke Nukem 3D for Nintendo 64 devices. The game does not bring much difference in gameplay or context, but, there are still many changes that have been made to fit the N64 platform.

title: F-ZERO X
description: F-ZERO X is a name that is famous for the racing genre. This version was produced for Nintendo 64 devices by the EAD division. This game is a successor to the 1990 F-Zero, published by Nintendo. F-Zero X is also the first version of the F-Zero series to own 3D graphics, opening for later games.

title: Gex 64 – Enter The Gecko
description: Gex 64: Enter the Gecko, also known briefly as Gex 64, is a platform game remade by Realtime Associates, based on the original Gex: Enter the Gecko. The game is one part of the Gex series, with the main theme revolving around an adorable gecko. Continuing with the previous version, the story continues with Gex retreating into hiding. One day, when the gecko was resting through the only TV, the screen suddenly flickered and went off. After that, two government agents appeared. Gex was forced to go to their headquarters. They say that Rez appears again, and no one else, they need Gex to defeat him again. After convincing efforts, Gex finally agreed after hearing the bargain he would receive shortly afterward. Gex’s journey from here starts again. The actions that Gex can perform on his journey are to use the tail whip to attack, or to use it to bounce, perform a typical karate kick, and do not leave him hungry when his long tongue can catch the flies to eat. Throughout the game, collect all of the remotes to find the unique joy of Gex. This funny game is rated as a parody.

title: Indiana Jones And The Infernal Machine
Killer Instinct Gold
description: Killer Instinct’s top fighting game series is now back with the Killer Instinct Gold version. This is the successor, also is the second version, released after the original Killer Instinct game. It is not surprising that Rare, once again, is the author of this famous game. The game was released by Nintendo, for the Nintendo 64 platform. In fact, this version is an alternative name for Killer Instinct 2 in the Arcade. So, if you’ve ever played Killer Instinct 2, then Killer Instinct Gold is not much different, including the story. However, because the cartridge memory is quite limited, the graphics of the game have been lowered a bit to 2.5D. The background will be set in 3D, while the two characters will fight in 2D graphics.

title: Mario Golf
description: Mario Golf is a sports game developed by Camelot Software Planning and published by Nintendo. The success of this version is a prerequisite for releasing later versions in the series. The game integrates a diverse number of characters. In addition to classic characters like Mario, Luigi, Princess Peach, Yoshi or Wario, there are other modern characters with the names Plum, Sonny, Charlie, for example. Naturally, there are still characters who require the player to unlock to be able to pick to participate in matches. Toad will still serve as a guide. There are eight courses that appear in this game, with different terrains and climate, to enhance the golf course’s challenges, including Toad Highlands, Koopa Park, Shy Guy Desert, and even the land of the adorable Yoshi you can see in the game of the same name – Yoshi’s Island. Up to ten different modes can be played in this game. Of those, half support multiplayer, allowing you and your friends to play golf. And the Tournament – the venue for the matches to glory road, is probably still considered as the main game mode. With Mario Golf, golf matches have never been this easy.

title: Mario Kart 64
description: “Super Mario Kart” seems to have paved the way for the whole Kart Racing series (or Cart Racing) successfully. And following that success, four years later, Nintendo went on to launch the “Mario Kart 64” successor to the Nintendo 64. The biggest difference compared to the previous version probably is the graphics when there will be no more pixels. Instead, the paths and characters will be formatted in 3D.

title: Mario Party
description: Mario Party is the first version to open the whole successes in the series of the same name. Coming to this name, players will probably be overwhelmed by the diversity in both features and modes, as well as component games. Mario Party is from developer Hudson Loft, brought to market by Nintendo for the Nintendo 64 platform. The game belongs to the Party genre, an indispensable game line in the fun. In addition to the core multiplayer mode, besides, the single-player mode will still be supported in this version.

title: Mario Party 2
description: Mario Party 2 is the second game in the Mario Party series. The game comes from the developer Hudson Soft, published by Nintendo in the early year of the new millennium (2000), for Nintendo 64 devices. It seems that its title has revealed what needs to be said in this game: Still remains the characters from the Mushroom World: Mario, Luigi, Princess Peach, Yoshi, Wario, and even Donkey Kong; as well as Party, is the genre that the game is directed at, allowing many players to gather together to join the play. In addition to the main multiplayer mode, Mario Party 2 also has a single-player mode along with AI-controlled opponents.

title: Mario Party 3
description: The name Mario Party is probably quite familiar, as it is one of the classic games used mostly for organizing fun when gathering with friends. Following the success of previous versions, Mario Party 3 continues to be developed and released by Hudson Soft and Nintendo, respectively. This third version is also the last version of the series to be released on Nintendo 64. The game belongs to the Party category, with many emphasized board games.

title: Mario Tennis
description: Mario Tennis is a sports game built on the inspiration of the characters in the Mushroom Kingdom, more specifically tennis. Tennis matches will be recreated in this name, including tournaments, where the main characters involved are Mario, Luigi, Troopa Koopa, or Donkey Kong, and other characters in the Another classic Mario game. If you are a fan of outdoor sports, and also a fan of these characters, then do not miss this game. The game is the second version of the series of the same name. Its launch is said to be the first leap forward when the game was designed in a modern graphic style. This version was developed by Camelot Software Planning and was published on the Nintendo 64 series by the Nintendo publisher. These classic tennis matches, of course, support both single-player mode (against machine AI) and multiplayer mode (play against machine AI or with your friends).

title: Mortal Kombat 4
description: When mentioning about the fighting genre, Mortal Kombat 4 (MK4) is one of the names that cannot be ignored. This is the fourth installment of the Mortal Kombat series. Perhaps this name is too famous when it appears on many other platforms such as Arcade, Microsoft Windows, Nintendo 64, PlayStation, Game Boy Color and is widely known throughout the country. In the world. This article will talk about the version of the Nintendo 64 series, developed by Eurocom and published by Midway Games.

title: Mortal Kombat Trilogy
description: When talking about one of the leading fighting games, we probably have to mention the name Mortal Kombat Trilogy. Its success has been demonstrated when this version has up to seven versions for seven separate platforms. As for Nintendo 64, it was released by Midway Games and marketed by Williams Entertainment. It is described as a combination of Mortal Kombat 3 and Ultimate Mortal Kombat 3. Therefore, the characters from these two games will appear in the Mortal Kombat Trilogy version. Each stage will ask the player to choose one of the characters. Initially, only Rain and Noob Saibot did not require unlocking to play, and of course, the characters later will all have to go through such a process. The significant new feature in this version is an integrated Aggressor bar. When the Kombatants fight, this meter will be charged gradually. Once reaching the top, the ability of the character will be increased by a multiple, which in particular the movement speed and combat damage will be significantly improved. However, this process only takes a short time. 3-on-3 matches will be held for the first time here. The characters also have quite brutal finish moves.

title: Mystical Ninja Starring Goemon
description: Ganbare Goemon: Neo Momoyama Bakufu no Odori, also known as Mystical Ninja Starring Goemon is one of the major versions of the Goemon series. This version has an action-adventure game and only focuses on developing one-player mode, suitable for those who want to explore new lands on their own. This version for Nintendo 64 was developed by Konami Computer Entertainment Osaka and was brought into the game market by Konami itself.
releaseDate:
JP: August 7, 1997
NA: April 16, 1998
EU: April 18, 1998

title: Nuclear Strike 64
description: “Nuclear Strike 64” is a shooting game released for Nintendo 64. Nuclear Strike is actually its original version, and Nuclear Strike 64 is a port remake of Pacific Coast Power & Light for Nintendo 64 platform and published by THQ. “Strike” is the original series of this game. Throughout the game, players will participate in a single story mode with the single-player mode. In this game, the main antagonist, Colonel Beauford LeMonde, has betrayed and stole a massive nuclear weapon. He succeeded in escaping. So, you, as the pilot of the plane, must pursue and search for him before everything breaks down. This shooting game has a special angle of view from the top, allowing you to experience the driving of large aircraft simultaneously with combat. Integrated into the game is up to fifteen different fighters. In addition, players can also use surface combat weapons such as the Multiple Launch Rocket System, a PACV hovercraft, or M1 Abrams tank for example. On five different terrains, players must perform many separate tasks. It could be searching and rescuing or destroying, and such tasks as destroying buildings.

title: Ogre Battle 64 – Person Of Lordly Caliber
Perfect Dark
description: If you’ve ever known the name GoldenEye 007 with the appearance of agent James Bond, then this is also considered as a similar game. Perfect Dark is the first game of the Perfect Dark series from the renowned developer Rare. This version is published by Nintendo for Nintendo 64 devices. Perfect Dark is a first-person shooter, in which the player will have to move in the stealth way. Both single-player and multiplayer modes are supported in this version.

title: Pilotwings 64
description: Let’s come along with us to the back old days through Pilotwings 64! This is an Amateur flight simulation game, which has been developed for the Nintendo 64 platform by the collaboration of Nintendo EAD, Nintendo R&D3, and Paradigm Simulation. The game was published by Nintendo in the year of 1996, and considered as the console’s debut, along with Super Mario 64. It’s a sequel of the original Pilotwings of Super Nintendo Entertainment System. Through this game, you will experience the flights as the role of the one who sits in a cabin, a true pilot.

title: Pokémon Puzzle League
description: Pokémon Puzzle League is a game created based on the Puzzle League series of Intelligent Systems. However, this version is a little bit different with the special participation of Pokémon. The game was developed by Nintendo Software Technology and released by Nintendo. As the name suggests, the game belongs to the Puzzle category.

title: Pokémon Snap (Pocket Monsters Snap)
description: Hey Pokémon lovers, are you ready to go to an extremely special version of the game? The mascots this time continue to be included in the game but in a completely different setting, compared to the other versions in the series. This is a product from the cooperation of HAL Laboratory and Pax Softnica. This version was published for Nintendo 64 devices by Nintendo. The game belongs to the first-person rail shooter, a part of Shoot ’em up.
releaseDate:
JP: March 21, 1999
NA: June 30, 1999
AU: March 23, 2000
EU: September 15, 2000

title: Pokémon Stadium
description: Pokémon Stadium is a game both developed and published by Nintendo. The game is a version designed exclusively for Nintendo 64 handheld devices, located in the Pokémon series, a renowned and relatively typical name from Japan. The game was designed and released in 3D. It revolves around battles with the main characters are Pokémon warriors with the number of up to 151 in all. All of these Pokemon have appeared in Pokémon Red, Pokémon Blue, and Pokémon Yellow if you are interested in games on the Game Boy brand.

title: Pokémon Stadium 2
description: When seeing the name Pokémon Stadium 2, at first, obviously many gamers will immediately think of the Pokemon series from Japan. Followed by the success of Pokémon Stadium, Pokémon Stadium 2 is the sequel for Nintendo 64 devices. The game was produced and released by Nintendo. This version supports both single-player and multiplayer modes. The number of fighters has been increased to 251, 100 more, compared to its predecessor. A special thing here is that Pokemon from your Game Boy can be imported into this game.

title: RR64 – Ridge Racer 64
description: It’s another game for speed enthusiasts, Ridge Racer 64. As the name suggests, the game belongs to the racing category. This version was developed by Nintendo Software Technology and published for Nintendo 64 by Nintendo. It belongs to the Ridge Racer series, which was the first version not released in Japan. Both single-player and multiplayer modes are included in this version.

title: Resident Evil 2 (Biohazard 2)
description: The name Resident Evil probably stormed for decades with different versions. It is a pity for those who have not known the existence of this series of movies. It is such a surprise that those films were adapted from this series of games. When it comes to the most successful version of the series, perhaps the name Resident Evil 2 will be mentioned first. Similar to the series, this game belongs to the genre of Survival horror. With a compelling storyline, the game seems to just focus on developing story mode with one player mode, and that is just enough. This version was developed by Capcom R&D Division 1 and released by Capcom itself. In the game, the player will have to control the main character is Leon or Claire, with a third view over the shoulder to perform the shootings. In addition, the characters also have to solve the puzzles corresponding to each different plot. In some situations, the player can also play the other character at the same time. After completing a campaign for one of the two characters, the other character can join it again to discover different perspectives and the other contents.

title: Shadowgate 64 – Trials Of The Four Towers
Snowboard Kids
description: What a name filled with childhood and cuteness! Snowboard Kids is a racing game. It was developed by Racdym and published by Atlus. Right from the name, we have felt a loving snow season. And indeed, the game is set in winter weather, in particular on the dense snowy mountains. At the beginning of the game, you will choose one of five Slash, Nancy, Jam, Linda, and Tommy to join the race. Only another character, Shinobin, will be unlocked later. The racetrack will span many places, through different terrains, such as amusement parks, a dark highway, even a whole village with cherry blossom festivals in Japan. The game received a lot of reviews saying that it was a bit of a Mario Kart direction. However, there are many things that only Snowboard Kids can do. One of them is the player can get a second item instead of just one. Therefore, he/she can simultaneously carry a shooting item and can bring an additional support item. In addition, to collect items on the road, players also need to pay an amount of 100 gold. This gold can be earned by picking up on the track or performing difficult techniques.

title: South Park
description: This is a game designed based on the famous South Park animation. If you are a loyal fan of that movie, then don’t miss the game of the same name. South Park is a game from developer Iguana Entertainment and was added to the Nintendo 64 game store by Acclaim Entertainment. The main game style of the game revolves around the shooting screen in the first view. The story takes place when the town of South Park is surrounded by a series of mutant species or even murderers. They rushed to the city when they heard that a comet would sweep here. The four main characters are Cartman, Kyle, Stan, and Kenny will have to stand up to protect this land. At the beginning of the game, the player must choose a character to start the journey to destroy the enemies, through the use of weapons. A level will end when the player finds an exit. In addition, the player also prevents the enemies, typically tanks from reaching. Otherwise, players will have to participate in a mini-game match is Penalty Round to destroy all the monsters. Besides, the game also integrates multiplayer mode with head-to-head battles.

title: Star Wars Episode I – Battle For Naboo
Star Wars Episode I: Racer
description: The original Star Wars name is a famous name, known as movies on the big screen. Receiving so much response from the audience, Star Wars: Episode I Racer was then released as a product created based on the name Star Wars Episode I: The Phantom Menace. The game comes from the developer and publisher LucasArts and was published for the Nintendo 64 devices. In addition, the game is featured on many other platforms, including Dreamcast, Game Boy Color, Microsoft Windows, and even is the Macintosh, from the early years since its launch. Racing is the main style of this version.

title: Star Wars: Rogue Squadron
description: Set in the fictional Star Wars galaxy and inspired by the Star Wars: X-wing Rogue Squadron comics, the game takes place primarily between events in the films A New Hope and The Empire Strikes Back. The player controls Luke Skywalker, commander of the elite X-wing pilots known as Rogue Squadron. As the game progresses, Skywalker and Rogue Squadron fight the Galactic Empire in sixteen missions across various planets.

title: StarCraft 64
description: StarCraft is a name that is famous for the series of the same name. It belongs to the Real-time strategy category, developed by the name Blizzard Entertainment. Besides the Nintendo 64 platform mentioned in this article, the other versions are designed specifically for PC platforms, typically with Microsoft Windows and macOS operating systems. The name StarCraft 64 is also used to distinguish the version on the Nintendo 64 platform from the rest. Although it is just a port version, it still inherits all the tasks from the original, including confidential or extended tasks. In addition to the single-player feature, this version also supports multi-player mode. Throughout the game will be three separate races: the Protoss (a humanoid race, possessing great predictive ability), Zerg (shaped like an insect with the ability to superior adaptation), and Terran (a neutral species between the two species). However, the ability of their fight is that neither side dominates the other. This is also a factor that the game focuses on since it creates a balance between species. Participating in the game, players will be forced to attack the AI ​​through different settings, easy, medium, hard, and insane. There are a total of 30 missions in single-player mode.

title: Super Mario 64
description: The childhood of most of us probably has the appearance of the plumber Mario, along with the familiar 2D interface in the Super Mario series. But with this version, Super Mario 64 has been improved and upgraded graphics format in a three-dimensional space. The game belongs to the platformer genre. If the other versions in this series have the participation of 4 main characters: Mario and Luigi brothers, Princess Peach, and the villain Bowser, then this version will not have the presence of Luigi with Multiplayer mode too. Honestly, just one Mario guy is more than enough. By joining the game, players will be able to enter the mushroom kingdom. However, it is no longer like the predecessor versions but become an open world. This has increased the challenge somewhat for the game, but also increased the fun, as well as the limitation when players can control the character to explore the kingdom without having to pay too much attention to the matter of time.

title: Super Smash Bros.
description: Super Smash Bros is a typical game from Nintendo. The first version was published only for the Nintendo 64 type (so it is called Super Smash Bros. 64 to avoid mistaking with the series of the same name), but the success was great enough that since its release, Nintendo has had to rethink and produce other descendants on more type of machines. The game belongs to the fighting genre.

title: The Legend Of Zelda – Ocarina Of Time
description: The stories of Hyrule kingdom in the role-playing genre’s The Legend of Zelda series (LoZ) seems to be too familiar with the gaming community when it is considered as the most successful one of all time. In particular, “The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time” is the fifth version, was released for the Nintendo 64 by Nintendo in 1998, after its predecessor of The Legend of Zelda: Link’s Awakening. This is perhaps the most beloved version of the series and is also the first game to be formatted in three-dimensional graphics.

title: The Legend of Zelda: Master of Time
description: After saving both Hyrule and Termina, Link found himself without a quest. He journeyed long and far without knowing what to do. He thought a lot about the time manipulation he had done and asked himself if he was the real hero or if he was just a victim of these stories. The more his obsession of time had grown, the more it felt that time was slowing down… Until it froze completely, condemning his journey to an endless day… Just before passing out from exhaustion, Link finally found a new country… Master of Time is a new story in a completely new world, Abello, where Link must restore the flow of time. Abello is a big and dangerous world, but Link can count on the help of Nite the fairy. Around 20 hours of gameplay in various areas and dungeons with custom cutscenes, songs and much more. Good luck finding all 100 skulltula tokens and 20 hearts!

title: Tom And Jerry In Fists Of Furry
description: Tom – the cat and Jerry – the mouse may not be strange to everyone anymore. Let’s return to their appearance in the game Tom and Jerry in Fists of Fury! The game was released by VIS Interactive and brought to the gaming market of Nintendo 64 by NewKidCo (Ubi Soft in PAL region). The mischief of these two characters will be evident through the fighting gameplay of the game. The game includes 8 levels. In addition to the scene like in the cartoon is the familiar kitchen, now, a boxing ring has been brought. In the game, players can use ordinary items to fight, including chairs, or bombs. Besides, there are also items with power-up function, making the character become invincible in a certain period of time, typically green gas will harm the enemy when they touch you. They will appear scattered in a few places. Funny actions like in the cartoon can take place in this game. Game integrated with up to eight different characters. Each of them has different skills and action styles. The first is the two main characters of the game, the remaining six characters are Butch Cat, Duckling (Quacker), Nibbles (Tuffy), Spike and Tyke.

title: Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 2
description: If you are a fan of this skateboarding street sport, then do not ignore the name Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 2. The real-life battles will be recreated in this version in a very realistic way. In fact, this version has created a great success through the first part of the series, Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater. Therefore, the second version of this series is no less attractive. The proof is that in addition to the Nintendo 64 version, in this article, it also has many ports on other platforms with numbers up to 8, including on PC devices. The game owns up to three main game modes, career mode, free-play mode, and even a multiplayer mode. In addition, the game also integrates a side mode, the level editor. While players will have to complete goals and missions in career mode or free-play mode to skateboard without having to overcome any barriers, and the multiplayer mode to compete with friends, the level editor will play the role of creating custom levels. In each match, like the previous version, the main role of the player will still be to create tricks or perform typical tasks such as scoring points, changing colors, or completing before the time set.

title: Toy Story 2
description: Surely the name Toy Story has become no stranger when it seems that everyone knows that, from children to adults. Continuing with the story of the toy world on the big screens are the games associated with it. Toy Story 2 is the next version of the opening version, Toy Story. The game has received a lot of acclaims, so it has also been remade with many versions for many different platforms. This version for the Nintendo 64 device was developed by Traveller’s Tales and its publisher, Activision. The graphics of the game can be evaluated as very beautiful that it looks like a movie version. So I can boldly say that, by participating in this game, you will once again enjoy the story, but with a more special role, being the protagonist.

title: Turok – Dinosaur Hunter (Tokisora Senshi Turok)
description: Turok: Dinosaur Hunter is a first-person shooter game, with the protagonist as Turok, a character already very famous in Valiant Comics. The game was developed by Iguana Entertainment and published by Acclaim Entertainment. The story in the sky plays around a time-travelling warrior Tal’Set, also known as Turok. His mission is to ensure the division of the two places, the Earth, of humankind and Lost Land, a primitive place with the appearance of dinosaurs, aliens, or even other creatures. Campaigner is an evil lord, he is looking for an ancient weapon of destruction called Chronosielter, to serve the purpose of destroying the boundary between the two eras to dominate them all. Because it is so powerful, it is divided into eight pieces stored in eight different places. The player is tasked with finding all eight pieces before Campaigner finds them. Participate in the game, the player will stand in the centre with seven gates leading to seven different places. However, a number of keys are required to open each gate. Each stage will have a piece of Chronosielter. In the process of finding them, don’t forget to use weapons to defeat the enemies you encounter.

title: WCW Vs. NWo – World Tour
description: WCW vs. nWo: World Tour is a hit game no less than the name WWF No Mercy. WCW explores the subject of professional wrestling. THQ’s risk-taking venture in this area seems to have paid off when it was one of the best-selling games of its time. On the Nintendo 64, the game ranked second, and it was not surprising that its next version, WCW / NWO REVENGE came in first. To bring the success of this game, I cannot help but mention the names of two prestigious developers, Asmik Ace Entertainment and AKI Corporation.

title: WCW-nWo Revenge
description: If you’ve ever heard of the name WWF No Mercy or experienced the hit game, then don’t miss the WCW / NWO Revenge. These two names can be said to have dominated the game market with the subject of pro wrestling. At that time, it was considered as the best-selling version of the wrestling games of Nintendo 64, and for such a third-party product, it was the version selling more than ever. WCW vs. nWo: World Tour is the predecessor release of this game. WCW / NWO Revenge comes from two developers Asmik Ace Entertainment and AKI Corporation, published by THQ. This is also the version that marks the end of AKI in creating a WCW for Nintendo 64.

title: WWF No Mercy
description: Do you want to take part in these fierce and “no mercy” matches? The pinnacle of wrestling matches on TV can now be recreated through “WWF No Mercy.” This game was developed by Asmik Ace Entertainment and AKI Corporation, posted by THQ for this Japanese Nintendo 64 devices. This version also marked the end of the series of wrestling games from famous for “WCW Vs. The World” producer. Like other versions, the game supports both single-player and multiplayer modes.

title: WWF WrestleMania 2000
description: If the name WWF No Mercy has made a huge success for this series of professional wrestling games, then WWF WrestleMania 2000 is an equally attractive game. The game is published by THQ. It revolves around the classic wrestling matches in the rings with the number of wrestlers in excess of 50. In it, some mysterious characters will be unlocked when you perform tasks such as completing a title. certain trophies a few times or collect concurrently or championship titles of two separate seasons. No matter which character you choose to start the match, you will still have to go up from as a newbie. Drive that fighter in classic battles to earn the titles in the game as well as take challenges from others and don’t forget to join the most important event, WrestleMania 2000. There are three main modes featured in the game are Royal Rumble, King of the Ring, and a pay-per-view mode like the actual matches players have seen on TV. A special feature that is integrated into this version is the ability to create wrestlers at will. Thanks to it, you can completely bring the characters from other wrestling games to this version by recreating their abilities.

title: Wave Race 64
description: Wave Race 64 is a surfing sports game. The game was developed and published by Nintendo EAD and Nintendo, respectively. Throughout the game will be the surfing phase on the Jet Ski. Championship, Stunt Mode and Time Trials are three modes built into the single-player mode. The Championship is the main and most focused game mode with four levels of difficulty classified in order: normal, hard, expert, and reverse which require the player to go through times. in turn. Each level has a different number of courses. The starting level is normal there will be six courses, this number increases to seven when it reaches a difficult level, and eight is the number of courses of each expert mode and reversed. Stunt mode will be the place that requires players to perform difficult techniques such as jumping into the air and then going through large buoys so that they do not touch in a circle. Meanwhile, Time Trials will be a place for players to challenge themselves to set the records. The gameplay is not much different from the terrestrial racing game when it also has ranks, laps, velocity, and time. However, the context this time brings more summer colors with cool beaches, which is quite interested for players.

title: World Cup 98
description: As the name suggests, this game is a remake of all the classic ’98 World Cup matches. The game is part of the FIFA World Cup series. This is also the first version that EA Sports developed after being approved by FIFA. Along with 3D graphics and the most realistic details, World Cup 98 promises to bring a new wave for sports games at that time. Naturally, the game focuses on creating a mode like a real World Cup, which is World Cup mode and World Cup Classics mode. Integrated in the game are 40 teams playing from 40 different countries. To start a match, the player can choose either their favorite team or let the system randomly choose. If your home team, unfortunately, did not win the championship trophy for this season, now, you can make your dream come true. The matches in the game are no different than in real life when there are still two halves, extra time, penalties, or friendly matches. After completing the main mode, the World Cup Classics mode with fifteen classic matches will be unlocked. In particular, the playing team is recreated completely similar to reality, from hairstyles to shirt colors.

title: Yoshi’s Story
description: The adorable Yoshi dinosaur can now shine in his own game called Yoshi’s Story. This is the first version, in addition to Yoshi’s Island series, to have Yoshi as the main character. Yoshi’s Story is a platform game for Nintendo 64, developed and published by Nintendo EAD and Nintendo, respectively. Later, it was not until 2007 that this version was officially introduced into Virtual Console devices.

title: Zelda No Densetsu – Mujura No Kamen
Zelda No Densetsu – Toki No Ocarina
